title: Bouthroton
description: Modern Butrint (Butrinti) in Albania. A UNESCO World Heritage Site because of its archaeological remains, which date from prehistoric times down through the late Middle Ages.

properties.description: Greek and Roman theater at the site of Butrint/Buthrotum
properties.title: Theater at Butrint

properties.description: Coordinates obtained by eye in Google Earth in September 2012 at an eye altitude of 130m and with reference to a map on www.butrint.org. Dates follow PECS.
properties.title: Center of the Theater at Butrint

properties.description: The so-called Triconch Palace. Coordinates captured by eye in Google Earth in September 2012 at an eye altitude of 500m. Dates after www.butrint.org
properties.title: Approximate Center of Roman House/Palace at Butrint

properties.description: Coordinates obtained by eye in Google Earth in September 2012 at an eye altitude of 155m. Dates after PECS.
properties.title: Centerpoint of the Baptistry at Butrint

properties.description: Coordinates obtained by eye in Google Earth in September 2012 at an eye altitude of 94m. Dates follow www.butrint.org
properties.title: Approximate Centerpoint: Visible Remains of "The Great Basilica" at Butrint
